aWFQuestionnaireDesc.Title: Details
aWFQuestionnaireDesc.Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1" ?> <Questionnaire> <Field Kind="Date"> <Id>Q1</Id> <Title> <Value>1. When was the diabetes first diagnosed?</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value></Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Field Kind="Boolean"> <Id>Q2</Id> <Title> <Value>2. Did you attend a diabetic clinic?</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value>No</Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Field Kind="Text"> <Id>Q2a</Id> <Title> <Value>(a) Name and address of clinic</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule>Q2 = Yes</VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>Under Title On Left</Presentor> <Value> <![CDATA[]]> </Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Field Kind="Date"> <Id>Q2b</Id> <Title> <Value>(b) Date of last attendance</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule>Q2 = Yes</VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value></Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Field Kind="Boolean"> <Id>Q3</Id> <Title> <Value>3. Are you now haveing oral drug treatment?</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value>No</Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Field Kind="Cstring"> <Id>Q3a</Id> <Title> <Value>Give name of drug</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule>Q3 = Yes</VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value></Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Field Kind="Boolean"> <Id>Q4</Id> <Title> <Value>4. Are you now taking insulin?</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value>No</Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Field Kind="Boolean"> <Id>Q5</Id> <Title> <Value>5. Has you intake of insulin or oral drugs varied the last 2 years?</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value>No</Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Field Kind="Cstring"> <Id>Q5a</Id> <Title> <Value>Give details</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule>Q5 = Yes</VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>Under Title On Left</Presentor> <Value></Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Field Kind="Boolean"> <Id>Q6</Id> <Title> <Value>6. Are you able to give your last two HbAlC results?</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value>Yes</Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Record> <Title> <Value>Give dates and results of your last two HbAIC (glycated haemoglobin)</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName></FontName> <FontSize>0</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule>Q6 = Yes</VisibilityRule> <Record> <Title> <Value>1st</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName></FontName> <FontSize>0</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <Line> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <Field Kind="Date"> <Id>Q61d</Id> <Title> <Value>Date</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value></Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Field Kind="Cstring"> <Id>Q61r</Id> <Title> <Value>Result</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value></Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> </Line> <PresentorKind>Expendable Group</PresentorKind> </Record> <Record> <Title> <Value>2nd</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName></FontName> <FontSize>0</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <Line> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <Field Kind="Date"> <Id>Q62d</Id> <Title> <Value>Date</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value></Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Field Kind="Cstring"> <Id>Q62r</Id> <Title> <Value>Result</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value></Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> </Line> <PresentorKind>Expendable Group</PresentorKind> </Record> <PresentorKind>Group Box</PresentorKind> </Record> <Record> <Title> <Value>7. How often do you test your blood or urine for glucose?</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName></FontName> <FontSize>0</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule>Q6 = No</VisibilityRule> <Field Kind="Enumerator"> <Id>Q7a</Id> <Title> <Value>(a) average pre breakfast bllod glucose</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value>Less than 8</Value> <PossibleValues> <Value>Less than 8</Value> <Value>8.1 - 9</Value> <Value>9.1 - 11</Value> <Value>11.1 or more</Value> </PossibleValues> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Field Kind="Enumerator"> <Id>Q7b</Id> <Title> <Value>(b) urine</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value>Glucose negative</Value> <PossibleValues> <Value>Glucose negative</Value> <Value>Glucose +</Value> <Value>Glucose ++</Value> <Value>Glucose +++ or more</Value> </PossibleValues> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Separator> <Title> <Value>If you do not routinely test your urine, please ignore Question 7.b.</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels>Italic</FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <PresentorKind>Title Separator</PresentorKind> </Separator> <PresentorKind>Group Box</PresentorKind> </Record> <Field Kind="Boolean"> <Id>Q8</Id> <Title> <Value>8. Since your treatment began, have you ever had a diabetic (hyperglycaemic) or insulin (hypoglycaemic) coma requiring the assistance of another person, hospital admission or intravenous glucose?</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value>No</Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Field Kind="Text"> <Id>Q8a</Id> <Title> <Value>Give details including dates</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule>Q8 = Yes</VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>Under Title On Left</Presentor> <Value> <![CDATA[]]> </Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Record> <Title> <Value>9. Have you ever had:</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName></FontName> <FontSize>0</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <Field Kind="Boolean"> <Id>Q9a</Id> <Title> <Value>(a) problem with your eyes</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value>No</Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Field Kind="Boolean"> <Id>Q9b</Id> <Title> <Value>(b) high blood pressure</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value>No</Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Field Kind="Boolean"> <Id>Q9c</Id> <Title> <Value>(c) heart or circulatory trouble</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value>No</Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Field Kind="Boolean"> <Id>Q9d</Id> <Title> <Value>(d) albumin or protein in your urine</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value>No</Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Field Kind="Boolean"> <Id>Q9e</Id> <Title> <Value>(e) numbness or tingling in your feet or legs</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>In Line</Presentor> <Value>No</Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <Field Kind="Text"> <Id>Q9details</Id> <Title> <Value>If yes, please give details</Value> <Presentor>Title Auto</Presentor> <Font> <FontName>MS Sans Serif</FontName> <FontSize>8</FontSize> <FontSels></FontSels> </Font> </Title> <VisibilityRule></VisibilityRule> <ValueInformation> <IsMandatory>No</IsMandatory> <Presentor>Under Title On Left</Presentor> <Value> <![CDATA[]]> </Value> </ValueInformation> </Field> <PresentorKind>Group Box</PresentorKind> </Record> </Questionnaire>
aWFQuestionnaireDesc.Name: Diabetes Details Questionnaire
